com.rift.coad.rdf.semantic.annotation.helpers
Class AnnotationHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.rdf.semantic.annotation.helpers.AnnotationHelper

public class AnnotationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines standard methods for retrieveing information from annotated classes.

          The default constructor of the annotation helper.

Method Detail

getAnnotation

public static java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.Class source,
                                                            java.lang.Class type)
This method returns the annotation matching the one specified, It first searches class annotations than it searches method parameter and method annotations.

Parameters:
source - The source to retrieve the annotations from.
type - The class type to match the annotation to.
Returns:
The return annotation.

getAnnotation

public static java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotation(java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations,
                                                            java.lang.Class type)
This method is responsible for returning the annotation identified by the class type.

Parameters:
annotations - The list of annotations to process.
type - The class type that the annotation must be retrieve for.
Returns:
The return tye annotation.

getAnnotationGroup

public static java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] getAnnotationGroup(java.lang.Class source,
                                                                   java.lang.Class type)
This method gets the specified annotations.

Parameters:
source - The source class to query.
type - The type to look through.
Returns:
The reference to the annotation to retrieve.
